verses.verse: אֵ֠לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These הַֽחֻקִּ֣ים <WH2706> ha-chuk-Kim These [are] the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִים֮ <WH4941> ve-ham-mish-pa-Tim and judgments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּשְׁמְר֣וּן <WH8104> tish-me-Run which ye shall observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֒ <WH6213> la-'a-sOt to do בָּאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz in the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> na-Tan giveth יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֧י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <WH1> 'a-vo-Tei-cha of thy fathers לְךָ֖ le-Cha לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <WH3423> le-rish-Tah; thee to possess כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> hai-ya-Mim, it all the days אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you חַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> chai-Yim that ye live עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah. upon the earth

אַבֵּ֣ד <WH6> 'ab-Bed Ye shall utterly תְּ֠אַבְּדוּן <WH6> Te-'ab-be-dun destroy אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַמְּקֹמ֞וֹת <WH4725> ham-me-ko-Mot all the places אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָֽבְדוּ־ <WH5647> 'a-ve-du- served שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> sham in it הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim, wherein the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you יֹרְשִׁ֥ים <WH3423> yo-re-Shim ye shall possess אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; their gods עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and הֶהָרִ֤ים <WH2022> he-ha-Rim mountains הָֽרָמִים֙ <WH7311> ha-ra-Mim upon the high וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and on הַגְּבָע֔וֹת <WH1389> hag-ge-va-'ot, and upon the hills וְתַ֖חַת <WH8478> ve-Ta-chat and under כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> 'etz tree רַעֲנָן׃ <WH7488> ra-'a-nan and under every green

וְנִתַּצְתֶּ֣ם <WH5422> ve-nit-tatz-Tem And ye shall overthrow אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִזְבּחֹתָ֗ם <WH4196> miz-b-cho-Tam, their altars וְשִׁבַּרְתֶּם֙ <WH7665> ve-shib-bar-Tem and break אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מַצֵּ֣בֹתָ֔ם <WH4676> matz-Tze-vo-Tam, their pillars וַאֲשֵֽׁרֵיהֶם֙ <WH842> va-'a-she-rei-Hem their groves תִּשְׂרְפ֣וּן <WH8313> tis-re-Fun and burn בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh, with fire וּפְסִילֵ֥י <WH6456> u-fe-si-Lei the graven images אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem of their gods תְּגַדֵּע֑וּן <WH1438> te-gad-de-'Un; and ye shall hew down וְאִבַּדְתֶּ֣ם <WH6> ve-'ib-bad-Tem and destroy אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁמָ֔ם <WH8034> she-Mam, the names מִן־ <WH4480> min- that הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom of them out of that place הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> ha-Hu. he
לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תַעֲשׂ֣וּן <WH6213> ta-'a-Sun Ye shall not do so כֵּ֔ן <WH3651> Ken, like לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

כִּ֠י <WH3588> ki for אִֽם־ <WH518> 'im- lo אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמָּק֞וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom But unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יִבְחַ֨ר <WH977> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֔ם <WH7626> shiv-tei-Chem, out of all your tribes לָשׂ֥וּם <WH7760> la-Sum to put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo his name שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> Sham; there לְשִׁכְנ֥וֹ <WH7933> le-shich-No there [even] unto his habitation תִדְרְשׁ֖וּ <WH1875> tid-re-Shu shall ye seek וּבָ֥אתָ <WH935> u-Va-ta and thither thou shalt come שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> Sham-mah. and there

וַהֲבֵאתֶ֣ם <WH935> va-ha-ve-Tem And thither ye shall bring שָׁ֗מָּה <WH8033> Sham-mah, There עֹלֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH5930> 'o-lo-tei-Chem your burnt offerings וְזִבְחֵיכֶ֔ם <WH2077> ve-ziv-chei-Chem, and your sacrifices וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et מַעְשְׂרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4643> ma'-se-Ro-tei-Chem, and your tithes וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> te-ru-Mat and heave offerings יֶדְכֶ֑ם <WH3027> yed-Chem; of your hand וְנִדְרֵיכֶם֙ <WH5088> ve-nid-rei-Chem and your vows וְנִדְבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5071> ve-nid-Vo-tei-Chem, and your freewill offerings וּבְכֹרֹ֥ת <WH1062> u-ve-cho-Rot and the firstlings בְּקַרְכֶ֖ם <WH1241> be-kar-Chem of your herds וְצֹאנְכֶֽם׃ <WH6629> ve-tzo-ne-Chem. and of your flocks

וַאֲכַלְתֶּם־ <WH398> va-'a-chal-tem- And there ye shall eat שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> Sham, There לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God וּשְׂמַחְתֶּ֗ם <WH8055> u-se-mach-Tem, and ye shall rejoice בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> be-Chol all מִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH4916> mish-Lach in all that ye put יֶדְכֶ֔ם <WH3027> yed-Chem, your hand אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you וּבָתֵּיכֶ֑ם <WH1004> u-vat-tei-Chem; unto ye and your households אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בֵּֽרַכְךָ֖ <WH1288> be-rach-Cha hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh wherein the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. thy God

לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not תַעֲשׂ֔וּן <WH6213> ta-'a-Sun, Ye shall not do כְּ֠כֹל <WH3605> Ke-chol all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what אֲנַ֧חְנוּ <WH587> 'a-Nach-nu we עֹשִׂ֛ים <WH6213> 'o-Sim after all [the things] that we do פֹּ֖ה <WH6311> poh here הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom; here this day אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- whatever הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> hai-ya-Shar whatsoever [is] right בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> be-'ei-Nav. in his own eyes

כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not בָּאתֶ֖ם <WH935> ba-Tem For ye are not as yet come עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- as עָ֑תָּה <WH6258> 'At-tah; yet אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמְּנוּחָה֙ <WH4496> ham-me-nu-Chah to the rest וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to הַֽנַּחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> han-na-cha-Lah, and to the inheritance אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha your God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> no-Ten giveth לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

וַעֲבַרְתֶּם֮ <WH5674> va-'a-var-Tem But [when] ye go over אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <WH3383> hai-yar-Den Jordan וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֣ם <WH3427> vi-shav-Tem and dwell בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz, in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God מַנְחִ֣יל <WH5157> man-Chil giveth you to inherit אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> 'et-Chem; וְהֵנִ֨יחַ <WH5117> ve-he-Ni-ach and [when] he giveth you rest לָכֶ֧ם la-Chem מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all אֹיְבֵיכֶ֛ם <WH341> 'o-ye-vei-Chem from all your enemies מִסָּבִ֖יב <WH5439> mis-sa-Viv round about וִֽישַׁבְתֶּם־ <WH3427> vi-shav-tem- so that ye dwell בֶּֽטַח׃ <WH983> Be-tach. in safety

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah shall come הַמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom, Then there shall be a place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יִבְחַר֩ <WH977> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֥ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God בּוֹ֙ bo לְשַׁכֵּ֤ן <WH7931> le-shak-Ken to dwell שְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> she-Mo to cause his name שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, there שָׁ֣מָּה <WH8033> Sham-mah there תָבִ֔יאוּ <WH935> ta-Vi-'u, there thither shall ye bring אֵ֛ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוֶּ֣ה <WH6680> me-tzav-Veh all that I command אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> 'et-Chem; עוֹלֹתֵיכֶ֣ם <WH5930> o-lo-tei-Chem you your burnt offerings וְזִבְחֵיכֶ֗ם <WH2077> ve-ziv-chei-Chem, and your sacrifices מַעְשְׂרֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH4643> ma'-se-ro-tei-Chem your tithes וּתְרֻמַ֣ת <WH8641> u-te-ru-Mat and the heave offering יֶדְכֶ֔ם <WH3027> yed-Chem, of your hand וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> ve-Chol and all מִבְחַ֣ר <WH4005> miv-Char and all your choice נִדְרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5088> nid-rei-Chem, vows אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher] which תִּדְּר֖וּ <WH5087> tid-de-Ru] which ye vow לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh.] unto the LORD

וּשְׂמַחְתֶּ֗ם <WH8055> u-se-mach-Tem, And ye shall rejoice לִפְנֵי֮ <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֒ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God אַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> 'at-Tem, you וּבְנֵיכֶם֙ <WH1121> u-ve-nei-Chem ye and your sons וּבְנֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1323> u-ve-No-tei-Chem, and your daughters וְעַבְדֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5650> ve-'av-dei-Chem and your menservants וְאַמְהֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH519> ve-'am-ho-tei-Chem; and your maidservants וְהַלֵּוִי֙ <WH3881> ve-hal-le-Vi and the Levite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בְּשַֽׁעֲרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH8179> be-sha-'a-rei-Chem, that [is] within your gates כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki forasmuch אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein has ל֛וֹ lo חֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> Che-lek as he hath no part וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> ve-na-cha-Lah nor inheritance אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <WH854> 'it-te-Chem. for

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <WH8104> hish-Sha-mer Take heed לְךָ֔ le-Cha, פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> pen- not תַּעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> ta-'a-Leh to thyself that thou offer עֹלֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH5930> 'o-lo-Tei-cha; not thy burnt offerings בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol every מָק֖וֹם <WH4725> ma-Kom in every place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher you תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> tir-'Eh. that thou seest

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- but בַּמָּק֞וֹם <WH4725> bam-ma-Kom But in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יִבְחַ֤ר <WH977> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD בְּאַחַ֣ד <WH259> be-'a-Chad in one שְׁבָטֶ֔יךָ <WH7626> she-va-Tei-cha, of thy tribes שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> sham there תַּעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> ta-'a-Leh there thou shalt offer עֹלֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH5930> 'o-lo-Tei-cha; thy burnt offerings וְשָׁ֣ם <WH8033> ve-Sham and there תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh, and there thou shalt do כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> kol all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH6680> me-tzav-Ve-ka. all that I command

רַק֩ <WH7535> rak within בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol any אַוַּ֨ת <WH185> 'av-Vat lusteth after נַפְשְׁךָ֜ <WH5315> naf-she-Cha whatsoever thy soul תִּזְבַּ֣ח׀ <WH2076> tiz-Bach Notwithstanding thou mayest kill וְאָכַלְתָּ֣ <WH398> ve-'a-chal-Ta and eat בָשָׂ֗ר <WH1320> va-Sar, flesh כְּבִרְכַּ֨ת <WH1293> ke-vir-Kat according to the blessing יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> na-tan- which he hath given לְךָ֖ le-Cha בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol whatever שְׁעָרֶ֑יךָ <WH8179> she-'a-Rei-cha; in all thy gates הַטָּמֵ֤א <WH2931> hat-ta-Me thee the unclean וְהַטָּהוֹר֙ <WH2889> ve-hat-ta-hOr and the clean יֹאכְלֶ֔נּוּ <WH398> yo-che-Len-nu, may eat כַּצְּבִ֖י <WH6643> katz-tze-Vi thereof as of the roebuck וְכָאַיָּֽל׃ <WH354> ve-cha-'ai-Yal. and as of the hart

רַ֥ק <WH7535> rak but הַדָּ֖ם <WH1818> had-Dam the blood לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not תֹאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> to-Che-lu; Only ye shall not eat עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz it upon the earth תִּשְׁפְּכֶ֖נּוּ <WH8210> tish-pe-Chen-nu ye shall pour כַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> kam-Ma-yim. as water
